Love the color… like that it’s lightweight…. Great fit

This top is so cute! I got the blue/white with yellow cuffs and it is perfect. I paired it with pink jeans for my first wear but it will go with nearly any color bottoms. I ordered according to the size chart and feel like it fits exactly as expected. I have a 40” bust and ordered the Medium-41.7” and it fits perfect. I feel like it is a flattering fit as well. It is not sweatshirt material; it’s half cotton, half polyester. It washed fine and I hang dried it according to the recommendations on the description. I’m very happy with this super cute top.

Having to return this green sweatshirt to UPS is a pain, since it’s obviously been mislabeled. I ordered a Large, same as my pink and white stripe, and look at the difference in both length and width. Beautiful shirt but now I have to return and wait for credit, hoping it’s still on sale when I get it. Buyer beware.

As a teacher, my wife struggles to find something that looks attractive but isn't too trendy or looks like an old lady's closet.  This classic style and comfortable fit made the sweatshirt perfect for work, and wearing out on the weekend going shopping, etc.
This crew neck sweater is very comfortable and true to size. It’s also flattering I really like it
Very fashionable! Runs a bit large but very trendy and cute!

I got this 50/50 cotton-poly blend striped sweatshirt for my daughter. We're headed to NY in 3 weeks from an island on the Texas coast. Basically, we'll be going from 75° to what...below 30°? We're told we're going to want to layer and this sweater seems perfect for it. It's not too thick or bulky. But it does have weight to it and, to me, that translates to high-quality materials being used. The navy blue and green stripes go so well together and I also like the contrast of the ribbed hem, cuffs and collar in that mustard yellow. My daughter fell in love with this pullover. As soon as she saw it, she begged to have it, claiming it was stylish and trendy. She said she loves the feel of it. It's very comfortable and not confining and she feels like she can move fluidly in it. She's excited to wear with skinny blue jeans and black combat boots. And top it with her black knee-length peacoat. Great sweater at a great price! For reference, she's wearing an XL - she's 5'3 and 180 lbs

This sweatshirt is super cute and completely on trend.  It is comfortable, soft and stylish.  It is thin but perfect for fall weather.  I have gotten multiple compliments already from people thinking it is the Free People brand.  I said even better "It's Trendy Queen and a quarter of the price."  Going to get  the Navy stripe with red accents too.
I thought like this looked like it would be a fun shirt to wear in the fall. Unfortunately, it runs very small. Not only that, but is not sweatshirt material.
Bought one. Loved it so much, I bought another one.  They are sized true to the chart and fit well. In this case you get more than you pay for.

This sweatshirt is pretty much exactly what I was expecting. The color is fun and a bit different than what I usually wear, so I decided to try it out. It's a casual feel, so I like to wear it around the house or when running errands. The biggest perk is that it's comfortable and warmer than some of my other sweatshirts/pullovers. Good quality material.
Great quality and true to color!
I really like this top. Not really what I would call a sweatshirt. If you want it a bit baggy, order a size up

My only complaint about this shirt is that I just wish it was a little softer. It's not horrible but it could be better. I love the color contrast of the stripes and the "cuffs". I'm 5'7", 148 lbs, and typically a medium, which I ordered. I'd say it runs true to size. I have long arms and they don't flow on me the same way they do in the photo.

This is a lightweight sweater that I wear without anything underneath. It's a bit more like a long-sleeve shirt. Fine for a fall day or with a coat over it when it's colder. It's not heavy weight, but that's what I like about it. Very comfortable and the colors are vibrant.

The Trendy Queen crewneck sweatshirt is a fun piece. The fabric is soft, a cotton blend. I like the contrast of colors - the stripes are brown & white and the trim is a brick red. The material is slightly thinner than I expected, but a great weight for fall weather or layering.
I’m 6 foot, 175 pounds and this was too short for my arms.  Colors were bright but the overall sizing was off for me.

Definitely not the warmest sweatshirt but it's very pretty and perfect for Summer-Fall transition weather. It is pretty loose so I bough smaller size than I typically would. Colors are great and quality looks good. I already have it in another color and glad to have the blue one too!
This has such a fun look and is very true to size, with a little extra room in the tummy. After getting one, I loved it so much, I got it in another color.
Comfy and fun!
I love the color! I wish the stripes were vertical though.

My wife is normally a "Large" or at worst "1XL" shirt person.  So to be safe we got the 1XL and it still seemed small.  Just keep that in mind if your getting the larger sizes.  Other then that the quality is a little rough (but does get better after washing, this increased the score).  Color was ok and expected based on picture.

I got this for my daughter and she loves it.  It fits great (she is 5'2" and weighs 107).  She got the brown and white striped one and got tons of compliments at work.

These striped sweatshirts are very popular this season. I love all of the color combinations, and blue and yellow are my two favorite colors. The sweatshirt is comfortable yet breathable. I got a small because I like my fall/winter clothes with room but not too oversized.

I absolutely love the brightness of the colors of this. It is a fairly lightweight sweatshirt that is comfortable and just one little tad oversized as I prefer. It washes well. I would buy this in several colors. I am 5'3" and 130 pounds and this fits me as I like a sweatshirt to fit me.

If you want to be very visible this shirt will do the trick! The colors are true to the picture and very bright. The fit guide is accurate if you measure yourself, I chose medium based on the bust size. It is soft enough and warm enough for light chill, layering might be needed for very cold weather. The colors feel very playful and youthfully oriented, great for people who work with young folks imo. I like the sweater, it doesn't have any weird flaws that stand out and the colors really slap you in the eyeballs.

Love this sweatshirt. I got it a size up the my normal size and glad I did. It’s on the baggy size and so so comfortable. It’s very well made and fits great. Highly recommend! Order a size up for a bigger fit.

I will be keeping this and it was a steal with the $11 coupon!
